author: BBC News
title: New York crime: Will more police flatten a wave of gun violence?
description: Gun crime in New York City is up by a third compared to last year amid calls to defund police.
content:
By Nada TawfikBBC News, New York
Media caption, Harlem mothers who lost sons to gun crime want more policing
